    Upcoming Events

    Next meetup ideas here if we have them

    R/Finance 2018: June 1st-2nd at UIC

    From the inaugural conference in 2009, the annual R/Finance conference in Chicago has become the primary meeting for academics and practioners interested in using R in Finance. Participants from academia and industry mingle for two days to exchange ideas about current research, best practices and applications.

    The best part is, it takes place right in our backyard!

    Looking for Employees / Consultants?

    A quick shoutout to recruiters that might be present and query the audience if anyone in the room works for a firm that is hiring.

    R-Ladies Chicago

    Thank you for attending and for all the work you do to support the Chicago R community!

    For more information follow their meetup:

    https://www.meetup.com/rladies-chicago/

    And Twitter: @RLadiesChicago
